name: Nightmares (Ludum Dare 35)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 35.

CONTROLS:

W AND S - MOVE FORWARD AND BACKWARDS

A AND D - ROTATE LEFT AND RIGHT

SPACE - SHOOT

Concept: You're someone going through their worst nightmare. In total darkness, their only weapon against a demon that can morph into a skeleton, ghost, and zombie.

OBJECTIVE: Don't get hit by the demon in any form (Invisible, Skeleton, Ghost or Zombie)

Not sure if this is my best or worse Ludum Dare yet but please rate on my LD page :D
